body.p: The Output stream collects batches of output records from the database. It encodes the data in ASN.1 format and distributes the resulting output files to the target destination. Output stream contains the following three nodes:

ul.li: CG Collector Node – a node that reads a batch of output records from the database and sends them forward in Data Refinery internal format.
ASN.1 Encoder Node – a node that converts the batch of output records into a file in ASN.1 format.
CG Distributor Node – a node used for delivering the output file to a predefined destination.
